PatientProfile.title: PatientProfile
PatientProfile.description: Represents a patient's profile, including medical history and diagnosis information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PatientProfile entity.

medicalHistory.description: Detailed medical history of the patient.

therapyGoals.description: Specific therapy goals set for the patient.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the patient.

contactInformation.description: The contact information of the patient.

SessionLog.title: SessionLog
SessionLog.description: Represents a log of a therapy session, including time-series sensor data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SessionLog entity.

startTime.description: Timestamp indicating the start of the session.

endTime.description: Timestamp indicating the end of the session.

sensorData.description: Time-series data captured from sensors during the session. Stored as JSON stringified format.

robotParameters.description: Parameters used for the robot during the session. Stored as JSON stringified format.

Report.title: Report
Report.description: Represents a detailed report generated for a therapy session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Report entity.

generationTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the report was generated.

content.description: The content of the report, potentially in a structured format like JSON or a textual format.

analyticsData.description: Serialized data containing analytics about the report

definition.description: Stores patient profiles. Patient profiles are nested under user IDs to ensure path-based ownership.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the patient profile.

params.name: patientId
params.description: The unique ID of the patient profile.

definition.description: Stores session logs for each patient. The 'patientId' field within SessionLog is a denormalized copy of the patient's ID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the patient profile.

params.name: patientId
params.description: The ID of the patient to which the session log belongs.

params.name: sessionId
params.description: The unique ID of the session log.

definition.description: Stores reports generated for therapy sessions. Includes denormalized 'patientId' and 'sessionId' fields for simplified querying.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the patient profile.

params.name: patientId
params.description: The ID of the patient to which the report belongs.

params.name: sessionId
params.description: The ID of the session to which the report belongs.

params.name: reportId
params.description: The unique ID of the report.
